Key Match Events: Jordyn Adams' infield single in the 13th inning lifted the Angels to a 4-3 victory
Adam Vaughn homered in the 4th inning
Taylor Ward singled to left in the 8th inning, scoring Neto
Gregory Campero singled to left in the 10th inning, scoring Adams
Rafael Devers singled to right in the 11th inning, scoring Amaya
Eric Wagaman singled to center in the 11th inning, scoring Moniak
Jordyn Adams reached on infield single to second, Wagaman scored in the 13th inning
Others: The game was played at Angel Stadium in Anaheim, California
The series is currently 2-1 in favor of the Angels
